replies.body: how come my friend cant make an account fix it riot plz
Had the same problem ages ago, try getting him/her to use a different computer or tablet to make it, or you could always make it for him, that's what my friend did.
Love the new Poppy{{champion:78}} ! It's so easy to gank her lane now (at lvl6), she just need to get a good angle to do her ult and done!{{item:3122}}
Yeah, when is the rework released?
when does this rework even come out?
still kind of disgusted by how cute they made her... Gremlin Poppy was way more unique and cute in her own way
